creator: greg-apache-bugs@nest.cx
text:
From user's perspective outputtype attribute of xslt task does nothing
output is always of type xml.

Internally it is caused by XSLTProcess not passing outputtype to its
liason. One line fix is attached.

creator: greg-apache-bugs@nest.cx
text:
Don't rush to commit this patch, it makes outputtype attribute mandatory,
for liasons are not capable of handling setOutputtype(null). Default value
needs to be established.

creator: greg-apache-bugs@nest.cx
text:
Created attachment 1999
This patch includes a default value and passes the current tests.
